event.title: A 30kW laser weapon has been deployed
event.description:
Recently, the United States Navy mounted a 30KW laser weapon on the "Ponce" amphibious transport dock ship, this laser weapon system can destroy the UAV and disable the boat. Laser weapons cost less than $1 at a time, while it usually takes millions of dollars to launch a missile.With the rapid growth of the global demand for missile defense, the U.S. military is looking for a cheaper, more powerful burning laser weapon to deal with the growing threat of ballistic missiles.The U.S. Department of defense believes the laser weapon is a cheaper and more effective way to intercept long-range ballistic missiles launched by North Korea and Iran.After more than 10 years of technical testing, the use of laser weapons for the battlefield is getting closer and closer.

Laser weapon aims at conque the world

The report noted that China is implementing the space program which is not inferior to the United States, Russia or Europe. As a result, the authors warn that China’s advanced aerospace high powered laser technology could pose a threat to U. S. military satellites in the event of a conflict. Russian military expert Dvorkin pointed out that the satellite as a potential target is not difficult to handle, because the United States can not be separated from the entire defense capabilities of the satellite.

A lot money has been put on laser weapon

The U.S. Congress has cost appropriated $119 billion for 100mw Laser Pointer defense projects, these projects include: Alaska and California land-based laser missile interception system deployment, mobile THAAD intercept burning laser weapons and missile warning radar. The Ministry of defense asked Congress to grant $34 billion to provide funding for these projects between 2017 and 2021.

However, if you want to use a 300mw Green Laser weapon to destroy a missile, you need a high powered laser weapon which can provide hundreds of kilowatts of power. The size of the laser weapon it too huge to shoot down the missile , only when make it miniaturization can be deployed at the jet fighter aircraft or unmanned aerial vehicles.
